coloured adjective
(RACE)
old-fashioned offensive a word used in the past to describe a person who has black or brown skin. This word is now considered offensive.
South African English in South Africa, a word used to describe a person whose parents are from different races. This word is now considered offensive by some people. : In the recent elections, the National Party was given a lot of support from the coloured population.
